sections.description: Summarizes utilization rates and percentages for different chassis usage categories (Street-MH, Street-EVG, Terminal, Grand Total). It provides a high-level overview of how effectively the chassis are being used across various segments.
sections.notes: Includes percentage breakdowns and overall utilization rate calculations.

sections.description: Presents key cost and usage metrics related to EVG chassis operations, including M&R, Admin, and Repo costs, as well as usage and contribution days. It provides a detailed breakdown of costs and usage at a high level.
sections.notes: Focuses on high-level cost and usage figures without time series data.

sections.description: Forecasts revenue based on chassis usage days, rates, and inflation assumptions. It breaks down revenue streams from Trucker Street Usage, EVG Street Rental, and Terminal Usage, projecting them over a 10-year period.
sections.notes: Includes annual inflation assumptions for various rates and costs, impacting the revenue projections. The date series is defined by ds_1.

sections.description: Summarizes the total revenue and provides a breakdown of costs per usage day, including M&R, Admin, and Repo costs. It calculates EBITDA and related metrics based on these figures.
key_components: EVG Average Cost per EVG Usage Day
Lease Cost per Day on EVG Chassis
Lease Cost on EVG Owned Chassis
sections.notes: Calculates EBITDA margin and provides cost breakdowns per usage day. The date series is defined by ds_1.

sections.description: Details the costs associated with acquiring chassis, including the price per chassis, reconditioning costs, decoupling costs, repositioning, and other related expenses. It calculates the total effective purchase price.
key_components: Less: Scrap Chassis at $1,000 per Chassis
sections.notes: Focuses on upfront costs and does not include a time series. Includes a calculation of Cash Multiple of 2014 EBITDA - Owned.

sections.section_name: Cash Flow Projection - Depreciated Value Exit
sections.description: Projects cash flows based on a depreciated value exit strategy, including EBITDA, accelerated depreciation, cash taxes, cash income, working capital investment, capex, and cash flow. It calculates the unlevered IRR and NPV.
sections.notes: Uses a 10-year projection and calculates key financial metrics like IRR and NPV. The date series is defined by ds_1.

sections.description: Projects cash flows based on a Total Enterprise Value (TEV) exit strategy, including EBITDA, accelerated depreciation, cash taxes, cash income, working capital investment, capex, and cash flow. It calculates the unlevered IRR and NPV.
sections.notes: Uses a 6-year projection and calculates key financial metrics like IRR and NPV. The date series is defined by ds_2.
